source: camena['2'] = camena['2'].apply(lambda x: int(re.search('(\d+)',x).group(0)) if re.search('(\d+)',x) else np.nan)

time_df = pd.DataFrame(camena['2'].value_counts()).reset_index().rename(columns={'index':'year', '2':'freq'})

fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(20, 10))
ax.bar(list(time_df['year']),list(time_df['freq']))
ax.set_title("Camena text frequency over time")
ax.set_ylabel("Frequency")
ax.set_xlabel("Year")
fig.autofmt_xdate()

plt.show()
Here, we plotted the frequency of text production over time.
camena['1'] = camena['1'].apply(lambda x: x.split(';') if ';' in x else x.split(',') if ',' in x else x.split('/') if '/' in x else x)
pn_df['lat'] = pn_df['geonames_xml'].apply(lambda x: float(x.find('lat').get_text()) if x != None else '')
pn_df['lng'] = pn_df['geonames_xml'].apply(lambda x: float(x.find('lng').get_text()) if x != None else '')

pn_df = pn_df[['placename','lat','lng','counts']]
## Latin type names
pn_drop = pn_df.drop(pn_df.loc[pn_df['lat'] == ''].index)

fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(16,12))
df[df['id'] == 'FR'].plot(ax=ax)

df[df['id'] == 'LU'].plot(ax=ax)
df[df['id'] == 'DK'].plot(ax=ax)
df[df['id'] == 'CZ'].plot(ax=ax)
df[df['id'] == 'SE'].plot(ax=ax)
pn_drop.plot(x="lng",y='lat',kind='scatter',c='counts', colormap="YlOrRd",ax=ax)
ax.grid(b=True, alpha=0.5)
plt.show()
Here, we plotted the frequency of text production in space.
